title: I do the validation with my own data using the script valid.py, but the result is abnormal
body:
I use valid.py, the result is: (on my own datasets)
 
Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets= 20 ] = 0.000
